name: tm52
effect: Teaches Focus Blast to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Focus Blast to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user attacks at full power. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat if it hits.
flavor_text.platinum: The user attacks at full power. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat if it hits.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user attacks at full power. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat if it hits.
